#generate monthly mean
```{r}
monthly_data <- ME_rawME_dayI %>%
  mutate( Date = ymd(sampledate)) %>% 
  mutate( Year = year(Date), 
          Month = month(Date), 
          Day = day(Date)) %>%
  group_by( Year,Month ) %>%
  summarise(total_biomass_monthly = mean(total_biomass))

```
